violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: The name seems ok to me

discussion.author: jakubwro
discussion.text:
> The name seems ok to me

Yes, this name matches other clients names like nats.py, nats.go, nats.js. I made it upper case as Julia packages usually use this convention for acronyms. Compat section is added now. Could you have a look @goerz if I did it right?
https://github.com/jakubwro/NATS.jl/blob/31685a3b3296e2c3285a1c5e0b09b7a6572c8c2e/Project.toml#L22

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: Seems like it. After the three-day waiting period ends, you can go on Slack to ask for a manual merge.
